title: A Poem by Edward Lear: The Owl and the pussy-cat
creator_credit: Contemporary Films, McGraw-Hill Films and John Korty
brief_description: Uses animation to portray the children’s poem ‘The Owl and the Pussy-cat’, by Edward Lear, in which the owl and the pussycat jump into their pea-green boat and sail out to the sea. Narrated by Cyril Ritchard. Suitable for lower primary level.
